Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index

Class WritableAbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX extends AbstractLuceneIndex<READER>,​READER extends IndexReader>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index.AbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX,​READER>
      • org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index.WritableAbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX,​READER>
  • Type Parameters:
    INDEX - - particular index implementation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, DatabaseIndex<READER>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WritableDatabaseSchemaIndex, WritableFulltextIndex
    public class WritableAbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX extends AbstractLuceneIndex<READER>,​READER extends IndexReader>
extends AbstractDatabaseIndex<INDEX,​READER>
    Writable lucene index representation that wraps provided index implementation and allow read only operations only on top of it.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create()
            throws IOException
        Creates new index. As part of creation process index will allocate all required folders, index failure storage and will create its first partition.

        Index creation do not automatically open it. To be able to use index please open it first.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • isReadOnly

        public boolean isReadOnly()
        Check if index is opened in read only mode
        Returns:
        true if index open in rad only mode

      • drop

        public void drop()
        Close index and deletes all it's partitions.

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws IOException
        Commits all index partitions.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public ResourceIterator<Path> snapshot()
                                throws IOException
        Snapshot of all file in all index partitions.
        Returns:
        iterator over all index files.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:

      • addNewPartition

        public AbstractIndexPartition addNewPartition()
                                       throws IOException
        Add new partition to the index. Must only be called by a single thread at a time.
        Returns:
        newly created partition
        Throws:
        IOException

      • markAsOnline

        public void markAsOnline()
                  throws IOException
        Marks index as online by including "status" -> "online" map into commit metadata of the first partition.
        Throws:
        IOException
